min: {property} has fewer elements than the minimum allowed.
max: {property} has more elements than the maximum allowed.
minLength: {property} is shorter than the minimum length allowed.
isEmail: {property} should be a valid email address.
isMongoId: {property} should be a valid MongoDB ObjectId.
isEnum: {property} does not match any valid enum value.
minDate: {property} is earlier than the minimum allowed date.
maxDate: {property} is later than the maximum allowed date.
isPasswordMedium: {property} must be a medium strength password.
safeString: {property} should be a safe string, containing only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and the symbols '_-'.
mobileNumberAllowed: {property} should be a valid mobile number.
maxBinaryFile: {property} size exceeds the maximum allowed. It should be less than {value}.
lessThanEqual: {property} should be less than or equal to {value}.
greaterThanEqual: {property} should be greater than or equal to {value}.

email.invalid: {property} should be a valid email address.
email.domainLength: {property} domain length should be less than or equal to 255 characters.
email.localPartMaxLength: {property} local part length should be less than or equal to 64 characters.
email.localPartDot: {property} local part should not start or end with a dot.
email.consecutiveDots: {property} local part should not contain consecutive dots.
email.invalidChars: {property} local part should not contain invalid characters.
